task.title: Creating a Status Button
task.shortdesc: Monday gives you a big picture view of your project and allows you to instantly see a tasks status. Editing the board status will let your team know where you are in the process of the task. The names and colors of the status can be altered.

prereq.p: Before you can add someone to a board, you must login and create a board.

taskbody.context: Creating a custom button can help increse the productivity of your unique team.

step.cmd: From the board page, click the box under the “Status” tab.
A box will appear with some options, Select “Add/Edit Labels”

info.p: The board will be automatically updated.

step.cmd: At the bottom, select the desired color for the new button.

info.p: A new button will appear.click on it to enter the new name for the label

step.cmd: click on the new label to enter the new name.

info.p:
Press enter and you can now use the button. Editing Button Label
